item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.13.2.54
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.13.2.54
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 22 Feb 2021 14:16:41 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards (up to 16) for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 32) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 32) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.13.2]
- New and improved sweep modes:
- Ramp /
- Ramp /\
- Smooth Ramp _/
- Smooth Ramp _/\_
- Freqeuncy

- New APIs:
- waitStatusCreated
- wai StatusIdle
- waitStatusStarted
- waitStatusStopped
- waitStatusSweepStarted
- waitStatusSweepStopped
- getSweepWaveforms (see above)
- setInputGains
- setOutputGains
- getInputGains
- getOutputGains

- Add support for amplifiers connected to output channels
- During a sweep the lockin will buffer and save AO and AI waveforms
- improved plot naming
- code refactoring related to UI elements
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
